#nametype [nametype]: 147

summoned with #246 Contact Gamayun (Conjuration 5)

The gamayun is a magical half-woman, half-bird of Rus. It has the head and chest of a woman and the body and lower parts of a bird. It is a bird of wisdom and prophecy, gifted with the knowledge of saints. It has magical skills as well as prophetic ones and is sometimes summoned to reveal arcane secrets.
